Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.GoldCard
public class GoldCard extends PlayableCard
A gold card is a playable card that requires resources to be placed on the board. All gold cards give points when played on the front side.

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int id, Resources type, PointsType points, Map<Resources,Integer> requiredResources, Map<CornerPosition,Corner> frontCorners, Map<CornerPosition,Corner> backCorners)
      Parameters:
      type - seed of the card
      points - points given when playing the front of the card
      requiredResources - resources needed to play the card
      frontCorners - corners of the front of the card
      backCorners - corners of the back of the card

  • Method Details

    • enoughResources

      public boolean enoughResources(Map<Elements,Integer> playerResources, CardSide side)
      Method to verify if the player has enough resources to play the card, on the specified side.
      Overrides:
      enoughResources in class PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      playerResources - resources owned by the player
      side - card side played
      Returns:
      true if player has enough resources, false otherwise
